SELECT datediff(now(), date(learning_time)) as `interval`, count(learning_type = '学习' or null) as learning_count, count(learning_type = '复习' or null) as review_count FROM learning_word_record where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) <= date(learning_time) AND user_id = #{userId} group by `interval`
